6// ExtensionBehavior.cpp: Extension name enumeration and data structures for storing extension
7// behavior.
8
9#include "compiler/translator/ExtensionBehavior.h"
10
11#include "common/debug.h"
12
13#include <string.h>
14
15#define LIST_EXTENSIONS(OP) \
16 OP(ANGLE_base_vertex_base_instance) \
17 OP(ANGLE_multi_draw) \
18 OP(ANGLE_texture_multisample) \
19 OP(APPLE_clip_distance) \
20 OP(ARB_texture_rectangle) \
21 OP(ARM_shader_framebuffer_fetch) \
22 OP(EXT_blend_func_extended) \
23 OP(EXT_draw_buffers) \
24 OP(EXT_frag_depth) \
25 OP(EXT_geometry_shader) \
26 OP(EXT_gpu_shader5) \
27 OP(EXT_shader_framebuffer_fetch) \
28 OP(EXT_shader_non_constant_global_initializers) \
29 OP(EXT_shader_texture_lod) \
30 OP(EXT_shadow_samplers) \
31 OP(EXT_texture_buffer) \
32 OP(EXT_texture_cube_map_array) \
33 OP(EXT_YUV_target) \
34 OP(NV_EGL_stream_consumer_external) \
35 OP(NV_shader_framebuffer_fetch) \
36 OP(NV_shader_noperspective_interpolation) \
37 OP(OES_EGL_image_external) \
38 OP(OES_EGL_image_external_essl3) \
39 OP(OES_shader_multisample_interpolation) \
40 OP(OES_shader_image_atomic) \
41 OP(OES_standard_derivatives) \
42 OP(OES_texture_3D) \
43 OP(OES_texture_buffer) \
44 OP(OES_texture_cube_map_array) \
45 OP(OES_texture_storage_multisample_2d_array) \
46 OP(OVR_multiview) \
47 OP(OVR_multiview2) \
48 OP(WEBGL_video_texture)
49
50namespace sh
51{
52
53#define RETURN_EXTENSION_NAME_CASE(ext) \
54 case TExtension::ext: \
55 return "GL_" #ext;
56
57const char *GetExtensionNameString(TExtension extension)
58{
59 switch (extension)
60 {
61 LIST_EXTENSIONS(RETURN_EXTENSION_NAME_CASE)
62 default:
63 UNREACHABLE();
64 return "";
65 }
66}
67
68#define RETURN_EXTENSION_IF_NAME_MATCHES(ext) \
69 if (strcmp(extWithoutGLPrefix, #ext) == 0) \
70 { \
71 return TExtension::ext; \
72 }
73
74TExtension GetExtensionByName(const char *extension)
75{
76 // If first characters of the extension don't equal "GL_", early out.
77 if (strncmp(extension, "GL_", 3) != 0)
78 {
79 return TExtension::UNDEFINED;
80 }
81 const char *extWithoutGLPrefix = extension + 3;
82
83 LIST_EXTENSIONS(RETURN_EXTENSION_IF_NAME_MATCHES)
84
85 return TExtension::UNDEFINED;
86}
87
88const char *GetBehaviorString(TBehavior b)
89{
90 switch (b)
91 {
92 case EBhRequire:
93 return "require";
94 case EBhEnable:
95 return "enable";
96 case EBhWarn:
97 return "warn";
98 case EBhDisable:
99 return "disable";
100 default:
101 return nullptr;
102 }
103}
104
105bool IsExtensionEnabled(const TExtensionBehavior &extBehavior, TExtension extension)
106{
107 ASSERT(extension != TExtension::UNDEFINED);
108 auto iter = extBehavior.find(extension);
109 return iter != extBehavior.end() &&
110 (iter->second == EBhEnable || iter->second == EBhRequire || iter->second == EBhWarn);
111}
112
113} // namespace sh
